meanings.definition: A disease or disorder of the bones.
meanings.sent1: Osteopathies can cause pain in the bones.
meanings.sent2: The doctor specializes in treating osteopathies.
meanings.sent3: When the skeleton threw a party, the osteopathies decided to dance all night.
meanings.sent4: The ancient tree's roots intertwined like osteopathies seeking strength.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the various forms of osteopathies found in fossils.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the prevention and treatment of diseases of the bones.
meanings.sent1: Studying osteopathies involves learning about bone health.
meanings.sent2: Osteopathies focus on maintaining skeletal well-being.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best osteopathies specialist was fierce at the medical conference.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of osteopathies was a solid foundation for her medical career.
meanings.sent5: The hospital's new wing was dedicated to research in osteopathies.
